Posts.Content: Concerned-222 wrote: Hi everybody, thanks for being here to support others. I have breast changes that could be cancer -puckering & shape change. I am uninsured. I am scrambling to try again to get some coverage (previously rejected for endometrial cancer apx. 10 ago) and I don't want to have a cancer diagnosis until after acquiring coverage. I am concerned that the 4-8 week delay may seriously undermine my health outcome. Any suggestions about how to maneuver through this? Thanks for your help. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: insurance V speedy diagnosis/care Concerned-222 Concerned-222
